title: What to Do If You Test Positive for Covid-19 as Omicron Variant Surges
sub_head: How long should you quarantine, who should you tell, and when should you call your doctor? Here are answers to your questions.
body:
The highly contagious Omicron variant of Covid-19 is gaining traction in the U.S. and more people are testing positive for the virus, including people who have been vaccinated or boosted.
After nearly two years of pandemic, figuring out what youâ€™re supposed to do after receiving a positive test result is still tricky, and varying vaccination status among the population makes the questions more complex.
